resources.string:
Hi, introducing Kevin 

Kevin is a Technology Consultant with experience delivering large-scale businesses transformation projects. With over 5 years of experience working across with technology strategy and implementation across various industries. 

Kevin has developed the skills required to successfully deliver technology implementations including project management, process analysis, systems architecture, software development & implementation, change management and sourcing.
